oldTripsWelcome: Welcome to the new version of Trip Planner! We've made some changes to the app and we need to import your old trips. Select the trips you want to import and click on the import button. The not imported trips will be deleted.
allNotSelectedTripsWillBeDeleted: All not selected trips will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?

whatADesertHere:
What a desert here!
Add your first trip stop!
newBackgroundsMessage: We have added new backgrounds to the app. Go to the settings to choose your favorite!
tripLanguageEmpty: Please select a language for the trip
tripsTutorialBody: This app is designed to help you plan your trips. You can create your own trips or take inspiration from the public trips. Now we will guide you through the main features of the app. This is the main screen, where you can see all your trips. Click on the + button to create a new trip.
dayTripsTutorialBody: Each trip is divided into days of trip. You can reorder them by dragging and dropping. Click on the "add day trip" card to add a new day of trip.
tripStopsTutorialBody: Each day of trip is divided into trip stops. You can reorder them by dragging and dropping. Click on the "add destination" card to add a new trip stop.
tutorialEndBody: You are now ready to use Trip Planner. Create you first trip, also taking inspiration from the public trips, and start planning your next adventure!
tripPrivacyShowCaseBody: You can choose if your trip is public or private. Public trips can be discovered by other users and added to their trips. Private trips are only visible to you.
addPublicTripFabShowCaseBody: You can create your trip inspired by this public trip. Click on this button to add it to your trips.
tripStopSlideShowCaseBody:
You can slide the trip stop card to show the options to mark it as done or delete it.

You can also slide the travel duration indicator to add a fictitious stop, for example for lunch or something else that will take up your time.
userEmailShareTrip: Email of the user with whom you want to share the trip
cannotShareWithYourself: You cannot share the trip with yourself!
tripNotIsNotSharedWithAnyone: The trip is not shared with anyone
removeTripQuestion: Are you sure you want to remove this trip?
